landing.faq1A: Start with the Pro plan free for 7 days. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

landing.faq2A: Yes. Connect via MetaApi for automatic sync, or import CSV manually.
landing.faq3A: AI agents analyze your trades to detect patterns, assess risk, and suggest improvements.
landing.faq4A: Yes. Credentials are encrypted. We never share your data with third parties.

landing.finalCtaSubtitle: Join 10,000+ traders who stopped guessing and started knowing.
landing.aboutHeroSubtitle: Empowering traders with data-driven decisions and AI-powered insights.
landing.aboutMission1: Trade AI Hub was founded by traders, for traders. We experienced firsthand the frustration of losing trades without understanding why, of repeating the same mistakes, and of lacking the tools to truly analyze our performance.
landing.aboutMission2: That's why we built Trade AI Hub: a platform that combines the discipline of trade journaling with the power of artificial intelligence. Our AI agents analyze your trading patterns, identify your strengths and weaknesses, and provide actionable insights to help you evolve.
landing.aboutMission3: We believe every trader deserves access to professional-grade analytics. That's why we offer a generous free tier and support traders globally with full English and Portuguese interfaces. Whether you're trading forex, crypto, or equities, Trade AI Hub helps you trade smarter.
landing.aboutValuesSubtitle: The principles that guide every feature we build.
landing.aboutValue1Desc: Trading decisions should be based on data, not gut feelings. We give you the metrics and patterns to make informed choices.
landing.aboutValue2Desc: Professional trading analytics shouldn't require a hedge fund budget. Our free tier gives every trader a strong foundation.
landing.aboutValue3Desc: AI enhances your judgment, it doesn't replace it. Our agents suggest and analyze, but you always make the final call.
landing.aboutValue4Desc: Your trade data is yours. We use encryption, row-level security, and never sell your data to third parties.
landing.aboutCtaSubtitle: Start analyzing your trades today. Free forever, upgrade when you're ready.
landing.contactHeroSubtitle: Have a question, feedback, or partnership idea? We'd love to hear from you.
landing.contactMessagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help...
landing.blogHeroSubtitle: Insights, guides, and trading wisdom to help you grow as a trader.
landing.blogComingSoonTitle: We're working on amazing content for you
landing.blogComingSoonDesc: Our team is crafting in-depth guides, market insights, and trading strategies. Subscribe to be the first to know when we launch.
landing.blogArticle1Title: 5 Metrics Every Forex Trader Should Track
landing.blogArticle1Desc: Discover the key performance indicators that separate profitable traders from the rest.
landing.blogArticle2Title: How AI is Changing Trading Journaling
landing.blogArticle2Desc: From pattern recognition to behavioral analysis, learn how AI transforms trade review.
landing.blogArticle3Title: From Losing to Winning: A Data-Driven Approach
landing.blogArticle3Desc: A practical guide to using your trading data to identify and fix recurring mistakes.
landing.privacyIntro: At Trade AI Hub, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.
landing.privacySection1Content:
We collect the following types of information:

Account Data: When you register, we collect your email address and password (hashed and salted). If you subscribe to a paid plan, payment information is processed by Stripe and never stored on our servers.

Trade Data: Trades you import (via CSV or MT4/MT5 sync through MetaApi) including entry/exit prices, dates, lot sizes, pairs, and any notes or tags you add.

Usage Data: We collect anonymous usage patterns such as pages visited, features used, and session duration to improve our service.
landing.privacySection2Content:
We use your information for the following purposes:

Service Delivery: To provide trade journaling, metrics calculation, and dashboard features.

AI Analysis: Your trade data is analyzed by our AI agents (powered by OpenAI) to generate insights, detect patterns, and provide personalized recommendations. Only anonymized trade data is sent to AI providers.

Service Improvement: Aggregated, anonymized usage data helps us improve features and user experience.
landing.privacySection3Content:
Your data is stored securely using Supabase (PostgreSQL) with enterprise-grade security measures:

Row-Level Security (RLS): Every database query is automatically filtered so you can only access your own data.

Encryption: Data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and sensitive fields like API credentials are encrypted at rest.

Access Control: Our team follows the principle of least privilege. No employee can access your individual trade data.
landing.privacySection4Content:
We integrate with the following third-party services:

Stripe: Processes payments. We never see or store your full credit card number. Stripe's privacy policy applies to payment data.

OpenAI: Powers our AI analysis features. We send anonymized trade data (no personal identifiers) for analysis. OpenAI does not use this data for training.

MetaApi: If you choose to sync MT4/MT5, MetaApi acts as an intermediary to access your broker data. Your broker credentials are encrypted and never stored in plaintext.
landing.privacySection5Content:
You have the following rights regarding your data:

Access: You can view all your data in your dashboard at any time.

Export: You can export your trade data in CSV format from your account settings.

Deletion: You can delete your account and all associated data at any time. Upon deletion, your data is permanently removed within 30 days.

We comply with GDPR (EU) and LGPD (Brazil) regulations. If you have specific data requests, contact us at support@tradeaihub.com.
landing.privacySection6Content:
We use only essential cookies required for the service to function:

Authentication cookies to keep you logged in.

Language preference cookies to remember your selected language.

We do not use tracking cookies, advertising cookies, or any third-party analytics cookies.
landing.privacySection7Content:
Active Account: Your data is retained as long as your account is active.

Deleted Account: When you delete your account, all personal data and trade data is permanently purged within 30 days. Anonymized, aggregated statistics may be retained for service improvement.

Inactive Accounts: Accounts inactive for more than 24 months may be flagged for deletion. We will notify you via email before any action is taken.
landing.privacySection8Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When we make significant changes, we will notify you via email or a prominent notice on our platform. Continued use of Trade AI Hub after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
landing.privacySection9Content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

Email: support@tradeaihub.com
landing.termsIntro: Welcome to Trade AI Hub. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.
landing.termsSection1Content: By creating an account or using Trade AI Hub, you agree to these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our service. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and continued use constitutes acceptance of any changes.
landing.termsSection2Content:
Trade AI Hub is an AI-powered trading journal and analytics platform. We provide tools for traders to record, analyze, and improve their trading performance.

IMPORTANT: Trade AI Hub is NOT a financial advisor, broker, or investment service. We do not provide financial advice, trading signals, or investment recommendations. All AI-generated insights are informational only and should not be considered financial advice.
landing.termsSection3Content:
To use Trade AI Hub, you must:

Provide a valid email address and create a secure password.

Be at least 18 years old or the age of majority in your jurisdiction.

Provide accurate and complete information.

Keep your account credentials confidential.

You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.
landing.termsSection4Content:
Free Plan: Available indefinitely with limited features as described on our pricing page.

Pro Plan: A paid subscription billed monthly or annually via Stripe.

Refund Policy: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee on paid plans. If you're not satisfied within the first 7 days of your subscription, contact support@tradeaihub.com for a full refund.

Cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your Pro features remain active until the end of the current billing period.
landing.termsSection5Content:
Our AI-powered features (insights, pattern detection, risk analysis, TakeZ Score, and copilot) are designed to help you understand your trading data. However:

AI insights are informational and educational only.

They do not constitute financial advice or trading recommendations.

Past performance analysis does not guarantee future results.

You are solely responsible for your trading decisions.

We are not liable for any trading losses that may occur while using our platform.
landing.termsSection6Content:
When using Trade AI Hub, you agree to:

Use the service only for lawful purposes.

Not attempt to reverse-engineer, hack, or disrupt the platform.

Not use the service to launder money or engage in illegal trading activities.

Take full responsibility for your own trading decisions.

Not share your account credentials with others.
landing.termsSection7Content:
Our Content: All Trade AI Hub branding, design, code, AI models, and features are our intellectual property. You may not copy, modify, or redistribute any part of our platform.

Your Data: You retain full ownership of your trade data. We do not claim any ownership rights over your trading records, notes, or analysis. You can export or delete your data at any time.
landing.termsSection8Content: Your use of Trade AI Hub is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which details how we collect, use, and protect your data. By using our service, you consent to data practices described in our Privacy Policy.
landing.termsSection9Content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law:

Trade AI Hub is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.

We are not responsible for any trading losses, missed opportunities, or financial damages arising from the use of our platform.

Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the service in the 12 months preceding any claim.

We are not liable for service interruptions, data loss due to circumstances beyond our control, or actions of third-party services (Stripe, OpenAI, MetaApi).
landing.termsSection10Content:
By Us: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms of Service, engage in fraudulent activity, or abuse the platform. We will provide notice when possible.

By You: You can cancel your account at any time from your account settings. Upon cancellation, your data will be permanently deleted within 30 days as described in our Privacy Policy.
landing.termsSection11Content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved through good-faith negotiation first, and if necessary, through binding arbitration.
landing.termsSection12Content:
If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

Email: support@tradeaihub.com

accountsPage.description: Link your MT4/MT5 accounts to automatically sync trades.
accountsPage.howItWorksDesc: When you link your account, we connect securely via MetaApi. You provide broker, server, and login. Credentials are encrypted and never stored in plain text. Sync fetches your trades periodically and updates the dashboard.
accountsPage.secureDisclaimer: Your credentials are encrypted and stored securely. We recommend using investor (read-only) password when available. We never store your password in plain text.

plans.freeDesc: Ideal to get started and understand your performance.
plans.proDesc: For traders who want to go further with advanced analytics.
plans.eliteDesc: For professional traders with AI and complete tools.
plans.upgradeCtaDesc: Access auto-sync, advanced reports, risk management and more.
plans.faqCancelAnswer: Yes! No contracts. You can cancel or downgrade whenever you want. When you cancel, your plan stays active until the end of the paid period.
plans.faqDowngrade: What happens to my data if I downgrade?
plans.faqDowngradeAnswer: Your data is kept. However, features from the higher plan will be disabled. If you return to a paid plan, everything will be available again.
plans.faqPayment: What payment methods do you accept?
plans.faqPaymentAnswer: Credit/debit card (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PIX and bank slip. Payments processed securely via Stripe.
plans.faqAnnual: Is there a discount for annual plans?
plans.faqAnnualAnswer: Yes! With the annual plan you save 2 months. Pro annual is $149/year and Elite is $249/year.
plans.upgradeSuccess: Upgrade successful! Your plan has been updated.
plans.checkoutCanceled: Checkout canceled. No charge was made.
